mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logical_entities(project_id, type, sub_type, name, label, definition, status) VALUES (CAST(#{description.project.id} AS INTEGER), #{description.type, typeHandler=reengineering.ddd.teamai.mybatis.typehandler.LogicalEntityTypeHandler}, #{description.subType, typeHandler=reengineering.ddd.teamai.mybatis.typehandler.SubTypeHandler}, #{description.name}, #{description.label}, #{description.definition, typeHandler=reengineering.ddd.teamai.mybatis.typehandler.EntityDefinitionHandler}, #{description.status})
